steps.name: Kubeconfig file
steps.value:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Config
users:
- name: percona-xtradb-cluster-operator
  user:
    token: XX
clusters:
- cluster:
    insecure-skip-tls-verify: true
    server: https://192.168.65.2:55000
  name: self-hosted-cluster
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: self-hosted-cluster
    user: percona-xtradb-cluster-operator
  name: percona-xtradb-cluster-context
current-context: percona-xtradb-cluster-context

steps.name: Highlight
steps.content: body > grafana-app > div > div > react-container > div > div.dashboard-scroll > div > div.view > div > div.submenu-controls { border: 2px dashed yellow; }

steps.name: Highlight
steps.content: body > grafana-app > div > div > react-container > div > div.dashboard-scroll > div > div.view > div > div.submenu-controls { border: none; }

viewport.comment: Viewport shrinks vertical menu to avoid ugly space
